snippet: Protesters allied with the Sri Lankan government blocked the exits at a meeting hall as the families of missing people met with diplomats and civil-society groups.
abstract: Protesters aligning themselves with Sri Lankan government block American and European diplomats from leaving meeting of families of missing people who disappeared in nation's 2009 civil war.

byline.original: By DHARISHA BASTIANS and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: Protesters allied with the Sri Lankan government blocked the exits at a meeting hall as the families of missing people met with diplomats and civil-society groups.

headline.main: Protesters in Sri Lanka Disrupt Meeting on Civil War Missing
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Protesters Disrupt Meeting About People Missing After Civil War
